content: Hello! Welcome to the Chemotherapy IG stream, looking forward to getting this project off the ground! Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions. Your facilitator, Mary Visceglia
Thanks for this Mary! A dedicated Zulip channel is a great idea!

I could probably update KDN5 manually with all our proposed changes. It shouldn't be too different from the example in the spec: http://build.fhir.org/plandefinition-example-kdn5-simplified.html
Except that our will have a bunch of extensions for the 'style guide notes' (the other sections of the template).
also, based on feedback from the Pharmacy committee, we'll be moving AUC back into a code unit (instead of using the extension we defined there)
anyway, i'll see what i can do

Hi all - FYI a copy of the presentation Mary gave at the FHIR Applications Roundtable at Duke University a couple of days ago is up on the wiki page under the "Documents" section: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Chemotherapy_IG
Hi all - Mary has started the project meeting tcon for today if you haven't yet joined!
Hi all - I've uploaded a copy of the meeting minutes from today's call on the wiki page
Thanks for joining the call today! Glad to see the interest, and looking forward to the next call on March 28, 2017 from 12-1pm (Eastern Time Zone)!
Hi all - There was a change in meeting time (moved up an hour) for the next meeting. It is now March 28, 2017 from 11am-12pm (Eastern Time Zone). This change has also been reflected on the wiki page.
FYI NO MEETING TODAY DUE TO THE HL7 WORKING GROUP MEETING IN MADRID!
